import { Component } from '@angular/core'; export interface Product { id: number; name: string; price: number; description: string; image: string; } @Component({ selector: 'app-insp', templateUrl: './insp.component.html', styleUrls: ['./insp.component.css'] }) export class InspComponent { products: Product[] = [ { id: 1, name: 'Watch 1', price: 100, description: 'Description 1', image: 'image1.jpg' }, { id: 2, name: 'Watch 2', price: 200, description: 'Description 2', image: 'image2.jpg' }, { id: 3, name: 'Watch 3', price: 300, description: 'Description 3', image: 'image3.jpg' }, ]; }
Tạo mới Sản Phẩm Thêm danh mục In dữ liệu
